sensitivityCorrectionFactor.description: Specify the sensitivity correction factor(Binning Factor) for Normalization between Exposure Tables

expTime.description: Exposure time (in NANO SECOND) at exposure knee

incrementPriority.description: Specify Exposure increment method from knee point. select between Gain and ExpTime priority

expIndex.description: Specify How exposure setting increase from this exposure knee(for ex: Gain priority will increase exposure strictly by gain first before Exposure time start increasing.

expTime.description: Exposure time (in NANO SECOND) at exposure knee

incrementPriority.description: Specify Exposure increment method from knee point. select between Gain and ExpTime priority

expIndex.description: Specify How exposure setting increase from this exposure knee(for ex: Gain priority will increase exposure strictly by gain first before Exposure time start increasing.

expTime.description: Exposure time (in NANO SECOND) at exposure knee

incrementPriority.description: Specify Exposure increment method from knee point. select between Gain and ExpTime priority

expIndex.description: Specify How exposure setting increase from this exposure knee(for ex: Gain priority will increase exposure strictly by gain first before Exposure time start increasing.

expTime.description: Exposure time (in NANO SECOND) at exposure knee

incrementPriority.description: Specify Exposure increment method from knee point. select between Gain and ExpTime priority

expIndex.description: Specify How exposure setting increase from this exposure knee(for ex: Gain priority will increase exposure strictly by gain first before Exposure time start increasing.

thresAntiBandingMinExpTimePct.description: Percentage of minimum exposure time ATB is performed. If use a typical value of 1, minimum Exposure time is strictly the banding peroid.

minPreviewVertBlankTime.description: Preview Minimum vertical Blanking time (in NANO SECOND)

enableEVExpTableAdj.description: Enable Flag for Exposure Table Adjustment wrt EV setting. Enabling allow Exp Table to extend beyond by digital gain

enableEVGainCapping.description: Enable Flag to cap Exposure table extension only to Max EV Gain specified below

maxEVCappingGain.description: Specify Maximum Gain Exposure table can extend to by EV settings(if EV Gain Capping is enabled)

previewISO100Gain.description: Specify the Gain corresponding to ISO100 in preview mode

enableAntiBandingVsISOPrio.description: Specify AntiBanding behavior when it conflicts with ISO settings. If enabled, it will favor Flicker compensation over ISO consistency

enableISOQuantization.description: Enable flag for Quantized ISO value reporting(instead of continuous levels)

thresQuantizationISOValue.description: (If ISO Quantization is enabled), it specify the ISO value thresholds to quantize for

antibandingVsFPSMethod.description: Specify impact on FPS under Flicker Compensation. LegacyAllowFPSToDrop will allow FPS to drop freely; StrictlyEnforceFPS will limit Flicker compensation only within FPS allowance, MaximizeExposureTime will allow partial FPS change in near-boundary case.

enablePreviewManualISO.description: Enable Flag to apply Manual ISO to Preview Exposure Setting

enablePreviewManualExpTime.description: Enable Flag to apply Manual Exposure Time to Preview Exposure Setting

enablePreviewManualFull.description: Enable Flag to apply Full Manual settings under full-manual mode to Preview Exposure Setting
